messages.msgSnippet: For Holly, I know of a Great Home-based business that is very flexible but I don t want to spam everyone on the list with info they don t want. So if you would
messages.messageBody:
For Holly,

I know of a Great Home-based business that is very flexible but I don't
want to spam everyone on the list with info they don't want. So if you
would like more info please contact me off-list at BethCMC@...

Beth



If I leave him I will have zero support from my family and I will have
to work full time
> to support my two kids. Does anyone know any stay at home work
opportunities
> that could actually support two kids? Any help or suggestions would
> be greatly appreciated.
>

> >
>
